name: Covid Busters (Danidan)
description:
This game was made and designed as part of the Customer Project in CMGT at Saxion University. You play as a nurse who has to herd sick and healthy NPCs to their houses and hospitals. You should be careful because the infection spreads between the NPCs and even to you.  Your goal is to eradicate the virus.

Controls:

  • WASD- Move Player
  • Mouse- Rotate Player
  • M1- Pull
  • M2- Push
  • L- Lockdown

Made by:  ADOCMA

  • Designers:
    • Dan Markov (Danidan)
  • Artists:
    • Airidas Radžvilas
    • Alex Kralev
    • Olga Slabozhanova
  • Engineers:
    • Casper Sikkens (marsmaantje)
    • Merlijn van Nieuwenhoven

Web Version coming soon! (hopefully)
